An unpowered orb is an item used to make air orbs, water orbs, earth orbs, or fire orbs using the Magic skill.

Uses[edit | edit source]

An unpowered orb is used to make enchanted orbs by casting an enchantment spell on the corresponding Obelisk using the Magic skill, creating an air orb, water orb, earth orb, or fire orb, which can then be attached to a battlestaff with the Crafting skill to make an air, water, earth, or fire battlestaff. This can be used as a popular yet very expensive method of quickly training Crafting.

Element Obelisk Spell Charged orb GE Price Level XP Battlestaff GE Price Level XP
Obelisk of Water Charge Water Orb 1,281 56 66 8,908 54 100
Obelisk of Earth Charge Earth Orb 1,032 60 70 8,879 58 112.5
Obelisk of Fire Charge Fire Orb 1,220 63 73 8,905 62 125
Obelisk of Air Charge Air Orb 1,341 66 76 8,889 66 137.5
